title: South Africa court adjourns Zuma corruption case
text:
South Africa court adjourns Zuma corruption case 11:18am BST - 01:09 
The Durban High Court adjourned until June 8 a case in which former South African president Jacob Zuma is accused of corruption in a $2.5 billion arms deal. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
The Durban High Court adjourned until June 8 a case in which former South African president Jacob Zuma is accused of corruption in a $2.5 billion arms deal.
